participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective individual who values independence and enjoys expressing herself through fashion and writing.
participant_1.background: I prefer to live alone, enjoying the freedom to watch my foreign films without interruption. I sew my own clothes. I don't have any siblings, but I've been doing some research on how to help my dog with his behavioral issues. My Impala needs a new paint job and I'm going to start working on that this weekend. I used to go to the library a lot more often, but now I prefer to read books on my Kindle.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Energetic and hands-on person who thrives in creative environments and enjoys spending time outdoors.
participant_2.background: I get to make gummy worms all day long, which is a dream come true for me! I don’t like kids. I just bought new hoop earrings. I enjoy classical music. I hunt, bike, and study my way through my day, thanks to my loving family.

content.text: Hi, I'm participant_1! I'm a writer and I love to sew my own clothes.
Hi, I'm participant_2! I'm a gummy worm maker and I love to bike and hunt.
That's a cool job! I wish I could make gummy worms all day long.
It is pretty great, but it can be hard work!
I bet! I'm sure it's worth it though.
Yeah, it is! I love my job.
I'm glad to hear that! What's your favorite thing about it?
I love getting to create new flavors and shapes of gummy worms.
That sounds really fun! I've always wanted to try making my own gummy worms.
You should! It's not as hard as you might think.
Maybe I will! I'll have to look up some recipes.
There are a lot of great recipes online.
